name: part3examples
description: Code examples for part3 of the FOS course

scripts.build:ui: rd /s /q build && cd ../fscodeexamples && npm run build --prod && xcopy ..\fscodeexamples\build ..\fsopart3ExampleNotes\build /s /i
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Luis A.
